name: Santa Maria-Style Salsa
description: The classic tomato and celery-based salsa is an accompaniment to Santa Maria-style barbecued tri-tip.
recipeIngredient: 2 large ripe tomatoes, diced (about 2 1/2 cups total)
1 stalk celery, peeled and diced (about 1/2 cup)
1 fresh California green chili (Poblano or Hatch can be substituted), diced (about 1/2 cup)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine tomatoes, celery, scallions, chili, cilantro, garlic, vinegar, and Worcestershire in a medium bowl and toss. Season to taste with salt. Let sit at room temperature for at least 1 hour. Serve. Refrigerate leftovers in a sealed container for up to 5 days.
